name: Haachama's Forest
description:
Something called "Haachama Syndrome" has been affecting close to 800k people. Sufferers slowly lose their sanity over time and have constant visions of the missing Vtuber "Akai Haato". You must complete a ritual to rid yourself of the syndrome or lose your sanity all together. 

3 Different Endings.

Controls :

WASD - Movement

E/LMB - Interact

F - Flashlight

ESC - Pause

Tips:

Your flashlight requires no batteries however slowly drains over time. Keeping it off will help charge it. 

Your character is able to sprint forwards and backwards for a short time, however keep an eye on your stamina meter because when it runs out you're unable to move for a few seconds. Enough time for Haachama to catch up to you.

She always knows where you are, so keep moving.
